content.value: protected virtual ValueTask<RunSummary> FailTest(TContext ctxt, TTest test, Exception exception)

parameters.description: The context that describes the current test case
The exception that was caused during startup.

return.description: Returns summary information about the test case run.

children.remarks: By default, uses to fail the test cases.

content.value: protected abstract ValueTask<RunSummary> RunTest(TContext ctxt, TTest test)

parameters.description: The context that describes the current test method

return.description: Returns summary information about the test case run.

children.summary: Override this method to run an individual test.

content.value: protected override ValueTask<RunSummary> RunTestCase(TContext ctxt, Exception? exception)
Protected Overrides Function RunTestCase(ctxt As TContext, exception As Exception) As ValueTask(Of RunSummary)

parameters.description: The context that describes the current test case
The exception that was caused during startup; should be used as an indicator that the downstream tests should fail with the provided exception rather than going through standard execution

return.description: Returns summary information about the tests that were run.

children.summary: Override this to run the test case.

summary: A base class that provides default behavior when running test cases which are assumed to result in one or more tests (that implement ).

content.value: public abstract class TestCaseRunner<TContext, TTestCase, TTest> : TestCaseRunnerBase<TContext, TTestCase> where TContext : TestCaseRunnerContext<TTestCase, TTest> where TTestCase : class, ITestCase where TTest : class, ITest

Public MustInherit Class TestCaseRunner(Of TContext As TestCaseRunnerContext(Of TTestCase, TTest), TTestCase As {Class, ITestCase}, TTest As {Class, ITest}) Inherits TestCaseRunnerBase(Of TContext, TTestCase)

typeParameters.description: The context type used by the runner
The type of the test case used by the test framework. Must derive from .
The type of the test that is generated from the test case. Must derive from .
